content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Burberry is a British luxury fashion house based in London\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", England. It has been founded in 1856 and focuses on and distributes trench coats (for which it is most famous), ready-to-wear outerwear, fashion accessories, fragrances, sunglasses, and cosmetics. Burberry's trademark check pattern has been used by the company since early 20th century and is recognized globally. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Listed on the London Stock Exchange, Burberry is a member of the FTSE 100 Index. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Burberry is a luxury house and outerwear pioneer with a uniquely British identity and a commitment to quality, innovation and creativity. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":699958,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a592bb8a-db35-4c48-b27e-a77c32b8be3d/Image 24-11-2022 at 14.38.jpeg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a592bb8a-db35-4c48-b27e-a77c32b8be3d/Image 24-11-2022 at 14.38.jpeg?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"Image 24-11-2022 at 14.38.jpeg\",\"name\":\"Image 24-11-2022 at 14.38.jpeg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"a592bb8a-db35-4c48-b27e-a77c32b8be3d\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":907,\"height\":508.76092715231783},\"extension\":\"jpeg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
